name: Tanki
description:
Tanki needs help getting from point A to point B, but he can only be told when and where to move on a blank screen! Give him the help he needs with swipe gestures and watch him execute on your commands!

The original prototype of this game was made for the Global Game Jam '18 in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania and was built in ~48 hours by Michael Knight, Eric Mofield, and Bradley Shively.
